article:
This is a list of show business families. It is contemporary (in the sense that
a professional offshoot should still be working in the 20th or 21st-centuries)
and should be expanded. The guideline is that at least one of the relationships
in the clan should be by blood â siblings, parents, children, cousins, and
so on. Following families are brothers and sisters who are recognizable as
celebrity siblings (and who may be listed within families as well).

The list of family connections in the Indian film industry is so extensive that
it has its own articleâsee List of Indian film clans.
